title: Dairying in Australia
creator_credit: Fraser Castle Productions, Norman Castle and Lilias Castle
brief_description: Shows scenes of milking, grazing of herds, production of hay, use of silage, production of small crops for farm use, fertilizing of pastures, pasteurization, cheese and butter making and export of dairy products.
